pages.text: You didn't randomly choose the name of the Radiance Pin to resemble the $(l:magical_items/radiance_staff)Radiance Staff$(/l).$(br)If you are in a dark area, the pin automatically creates an invisible light on you. Unlike the lights of the $(l:magical_items/radiance_staff)Radiance Staff$(/l), however, they slowly become fainter and fainter until they eventually dissipate completely.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Fantastic to see the paths you've already taken in your cave explorations.
